{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07482v1", "title": "Tame categorical local Langlands correspondence", "summary": "In one of our previous articles, we outlined the formulation of a version of
the categorical arithmetic local Langlands conjecture. The aims of this article
are threefold. First, we provide a detailed account of one component of this
conjecture: the local Langlands category. Second, we aim to prove this
conjecture in the tame case for quasi-split unramified reductive groups.
Finally, we will explore the first applications of such categorical
equivalence.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT,math.AG", "published": "2025-04-10T06:24:41Z"}
